content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 11, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 26, "index": 21}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral", "quantity": 41, "index": 30}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 33, "index": 31}, {"type": "shulker_shell", "quantity": 37, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 45, "index": 35}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 45, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft chiseled_polished_blackstone, I need to place two polished_blackstone_slab blocks side by side in the crafting table. The first polished_blackstone_slab is at slot 12, so I will move it to slot 1.
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 11, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 26, "index": 21}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral", "quantity": 41, "index": 30}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 33, "index": 31}, {"type": "shulker_shell", "quantity": 37, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 45, "index": 35}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 45, "index": 44}]
thought: I have moved the first polished_blackstone_slab to slot 1, so now I need to move the second polished_blackstone_slab to slot 4 (which is next to slot 1).
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 11, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 26, "index": 21}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral", "quantity": 41, "index": 30}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 33, "index": 31}, {"type": "shulker_shell", "quantity": 37, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 45, "index": 35}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 45, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have placed the polished_blackstone_slab blocks in the crafting table, I can craft the chiseled_polished_blackstone. I will move it from slot 0 to slot 11.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
